title: Correction: Prevention and management of type 2 diabetes mellitus in Uganda and South Africa: Findings from the SMART2D pragmatic implementation trial
content: by David Guwatudde, Peter Delobelle, Pilvikki Absetz, Josefien van Olmen, Roy William Mayega, Francis Xavier Kasujja, Jeroen De Man, Mariam Hassen, Elizabeth Ekirapa Kiracho, Juliet Kiguli, Thandi Puoane, Claes-Goran Ostenson, Stefan Peterson, Meena Daivadanam, SMART2D Consortium
author: David Guwatudde
